newsitem.title: USA: PC Quote ends plans to acquire MoneyLine.
newsitem.headline: PC Quote ends plans to acquire MoneyLine.

text.p: PC Quote Inc, citing poor market conditions, said Thursday it terminated its plan to acquire MoneyLine Corp.

The proposed acquisition, originally announced last May, was subject to execution of a definitive agreement. It had called for MoneyLine to become a wholly-owned PC Quote subsidiary in exchange for 350,000 shares of PC Quote common stock.
"We are still pursuing various joint marketing opportunities with MoneyLine, the Internet's first provider of real-time fixed-income information," said Louis Morgan, PC Quote chairman.
PC Quote provides online stock and market quotes.
